decision_conditions: This permission is granted for a limited period expiring on 30th April 2035 when the tent structure hereby permitted shall be removed and the land reinstated.Reason: To ensure the development proposed accords with relevant Policy, including Green Belt Policy, and to preserve the visual amenities of the adjoining Conservation Area.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:7011-50 Existing Site Plan 7011-51 Proposed Site Plan 7011-52 Proposed Plans Tent7011-53 Location Plan Tent Specification BrochureDesign and Access StatementHeritage StatementPlanning StatementSUDs StrategyTransport Statememt dated 12 May 2025Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
The development shall be carried out in materials as specified in the submitted application and as shown on the approved plans. Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance.

Details of surfacing materials to be used for footpaths and any other external hard surfacing, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The surfacing shall be carried out in accordance with the approved detail before the development is occupied or use commences. Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance

Prior to the occupation of the development, details of any internal and external lighting shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The lighting shall be installed in accordance with the approved details. Reason: To minimise the impact of light pollution having regard to the Green Belt setting.

No plant or equipment shall be affixed to any external face of a building or added to the roof of a building other than that shown in the approved drawings.Reason: In the interest of amenity and to ensure a satisfactory external appearance in accordance withpolicy D4 of the London Plan (2021), CP30 of the Enfield Core Strategy (2010) and DMD37 of theEnfield Development Management Policy (2014).

Prior to the installation of any lighting or heating in the tent structure hereby approved, an Energy Statement demonstrating how unregulated energy use shall be managed shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details. Reason: In the interest of sustainable development and to ensure that the Local Planning Authority may be satisfied that CO2 emission reduction targets are met.

The existing vegetation screen along the south western site boundary shall be retained for the lifetime of the development. Reason: To provide visual screening and in the interest of residential amenity.
description: Variation of condition 01 Ref: 24/03277/FUL to change the wording to "this permission is granted for a limited period expiring 30th April 2035 when the tent structure hereby permitted shall be removed and the land reinstated".
